comment._content: This locomotive was destined for governmental use

comment.author: 8293801@N07
comment._content: Class VI c of Großherzoglich Badische Staatsbahn (later class 75 of Deutsche Reichsbahn). 135 units built 1914 to 1921, in service until 1969, one unit preserved in working order (75 1118). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baden_VI_c
